Module wgu.inventoryfxmlapp
Package controller

Class ModifyPartFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainFormController
controller.ModifyPartFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyPartFormController extends MainFormController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the Modify Part Form.

Manages the interaction between the user and the Modify Part Form UI, allowing users to modify details of existing parts in the inventory. Supports modification of both InHouse and OutSourced part types.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called after the FXML file has been loaded.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Overrides:
      initialize in class MainFormController
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if unknown.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if not localized.

    • onInHouse

      public void onInHouse(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the selection of the InHouse radio button, updating the UI to reflect the InHouse part type specifics.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.

    • onOutSourced

      public void onOutSourced(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

      Parameters:

    • populateForm

      public void populateForm(Part part)
      Populates the form fields with the data from the part being modified. Adjusts the form to show fields relevant to the type of the part.
      Parameters:
      part - The part whose data is to be loaded into the form fields.

    • onModifyPartCancel

      public void onModifyPartCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the action of cancelling part modification. Returns to the main screen without saving any changes.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the main form.

    • onModifyPartSave

      public void onModifyPartSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action of saving the modified part. Validates the input fields and updates the part in the inventory with the new details. Then returns to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event that triggered this action.
